properties.Name: OrderLineCharge
properties.Description:
A charge at the Invoice Line Level.

Ex:
- Freight for a specific Invoice Line Item.

Columns.Name: OrderId
Columns.Description: The unique number that identifies an Order.

Columns.Name: OrderLineNumber
Columns.Description: The number that identifies the Order Line Item.

Columns.Name: OrderChargeTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Order Charge Type.

Columns.Name: ChargeByPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: OrderLineChargeNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the charge.

Properties.Description:
A charge at the Invoice Line Level.

Ex:
- Freight for a specific Invoice Line Item.
